meanings.definition: An activity done regularly in one's leisure time for pleasure.
meanings.sent1: Her hobby is painting beautiful landscapes.
meanings.sent2: Reading mystery novels is a popular hobby.
meanings.sent3: His hobby of collecting stamps keeps him busy.
meanings.sent4: Exploring new hiking trails has become her favorite hobby.
meanings.sent5: The hobby of knitting brings her joy and relaxation.

meanings.sent3: Her hobby of baking cookies always impresses her friends.
meanings.sent4: Traveling to different countries has become a global hobby.
meanings.sent5: The hobby of birdwatching allows you to connect with nature.
